Name: Mega Serval
About the game: Something strange is afoot in the peaceful Japari Park and it's up to Serval , the aptly named serval cat, to investigate! Run, jump and shoot your way through twelve platforming stages in any order you choose, save your friends and confront the growing threat looming over the park and its animal-themed inhabitants. Through the power of friendship (and a fox's meddling), Serval can copy the abilities of the friends she saves, giving her more offensive and defensive options when traversing stages! Use these new abilities to your advantage against the game's end-of-stage bosses. 'Serveral' features: Twelve platforming action stages! Steam Achievements track your progress! Leaderboard keep track of your best times. A plethora of difficulty options to suit a variety of skill levels. Unlock abilities and find health upgrades in stages. Configure the controls to your liking! Xinput compatible! Go on safari! Friends are hidden in the game's stages. Play at your own pace in the main story or compete for the top time in race mode! Wear a maid outfit!
